title: shibbikaiyil
sahitya:
shibikayil ezhunnaruLIDunnu shrI sArasanAbhan 


caraNam 1    vibudhALi kalpasUnangaL viravil varSiccIDavE
    caraNam 2    muni vrndattin manadAriDil  mOdam mudirnnIDavE
    caraNam 3    sura nAyaka nagarE bhEri niraiyum muzangIDavE
    caraNam 4    gandharvOpama gAyakar gAnam sheidiDavE
    caraNam 5    kamalE vaNTiNTa lOkar kautukAL niranjiDavE
